snippet.title: Sid Meier's Civilization VII - "Rediscover Hope" Opening Cinematic
snippet.description:
The past is more than what we leave behind. Watch the layers of history take shape in the official opening cinematic to Civilization VII.

Sid Meier's Civilization VII launches worldwide on February 11, 2025 for PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam (which also supports Mac and Linux) and the Epic Games Store. Cross-play multiplayer and cross-progression are supported across platforms.

► Pre-Order CIVILIZATION VII now: https://2kgam.es/Civ7
► Link your 2K Account to unlock Napoleon in Civ 7: https://2kgam.es/Napoleon
► Visit the Game Guide for more on each leader and civ: https://2kgam.es/Civ7GameGuide

---------------------------------
CREDITS
---------------------------------
CINEMATIC
Firaxis: Chris Staehler (Director), Maya Himelfarb (Producer), Cat Manning (Narrative Director)
Contributors: Waterproof

---------------------------------
MUSIC
---------------------------------
“CARVED IN STONE”
Publishers: Christopher Tin (Tin Works Publishing, LLC)
Contributors: Christopher Tin (Composer), Christopher Tin (Producer), Rich Breen (Mixing Engineer), Theo Schmitt (Studio Personnel), FILMHarmonic Orchestra (Performer), Miloš Jahoda (Performer), Andy Brick (Conductor), Geoff Knorr (Co-Producer), Jakub Hadraba (Recording Engineer), Čeněk Kotzmann (Assistant Recording Engineer), Jan Krček (Assistant Recording Engineer), Ivan Zbíral (Assistant Recording Engineer), Sandro Friedrich (Performer), Petr Pýcha (Studio Personnel), Tomáš Kirschner (Orchestrator), Miloš Jahoda (Cello)

The award-winning strategy game franchise returns with a revolutionary new chapter. Sid Meier's Civilization® VII is a turn-based strategy game that empowers you to build the greatest empire the world has ever known!

In Civilization VII, your strategic decisions shape the unique cultural lineage of your evolving empire. Rule as one of many legendary leaders from throughout history and steer the course of your story by choosing a new civilization to represent your empire in each Age of human advancement.

Construct cities and architectural wonders to expand your territory, improve your civilization with technological breakthroughs, and conquer or cooperate with rival civilizations as you explore the far reaches of the unknown world. Pursue prosperity in an immersive solo experience or play with others in online multiplayer.

Whether you choose to follow a path rooted in history or reimagine possibilities to chart your own way forward, build something you believe in and create a legacy that echoes through the Ages in Civilization VII.
